attributes.action: Martin Taylor is being slandered and libelled and we call on our government to intervene in the latest outburst from Sepp Blatter
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Martin Taylor is a decent professional footballer with an exemplary record in his career.
He is now being set up as some sort of animal for what was no more than an accident.
He is being slandered and libelled by a few and defended by many.
It is time someone stood up and defended the man, and as a British subject I implore the government to intervene and back this attack from foreign shores, particularly Sepp Blatter who is a disgrace in himself and should now retire from his position.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
